name: SnapTrade
headline: Plaid for trading
description: SnapTrade is an API to connect retail brokerage accounts to any fintech app. We enable API access to real-time account data, historical transactions, and trading. This makes it possible to build new investing experiences with existing brokerage accounts, so users don't need to transfer and it's easier to get started.

founders.name: Brendan Lee Young, Founder
founders.description:
I'm originally from Trinidad and Tobago but I live in Canada (for now). In a past life I was a DJ and party promoter. Be careful what you say around me because I just might turn what you've said into a song and maybe a dance. Don't believe me? Just ask my wife :) 
Finally, I love helping people and finding win-win solutions. As an entrepreneur, my goal is to build something people want and love.

founders.name: Brendan Wood, Founder
founders.description: I'm a robotics engineer that specializes in software and high-performance computing. I'm a father of three from New Brunswick, Canada, and my favorite thing to do is drift down lazy rivers in a canoe.

raw_markdown="[![SnapTrade-Logo](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zn2OCx5LeNNTwmok_SnapTrade.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/</>)
[Integrations](https://snaptrade.com/</brokerage-integrations>)
[Documentation](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/docs.snaptrade.com/docs/getting-started>)

[Get started](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/dashboard.snaptrade.com/signup>)
Backed by[![ycombinator](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zn2trB5LeNNTwm34_y-combinator.svg)Combinator](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/snaptrade>)
## Connect retailbrokerage accountsto your app
SnapTrade enables account syncing and trading from within your app. With one integration get connectivity major retail brokerages across the globe.
[Book a demo](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/dashboard.snaptrade.com/contact-us>)
TRUSTED BY LEADING INVESTING TOOLS
[![Blossom and SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqgAKR5LeNNTxk8I_Blossom.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/www.blossomsocial.ca/>)
[![Tiicker and SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqgAJx5LeNNTxk8H_Tiicker.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/www.tiicker.com/>)
[![Delta and SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zs4S5UaF0TcGJcA3_Delta.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/delta.app/en>)
[![Simply Wall Street and SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zs4NM0aF0TcGJb-p_SWST.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/simplywall.st/>)
[![Sharesight and SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqgAJB5LeNNTxk8E_Sharesight.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/www.sharesight.com/ca/>)
[![Kubera and SnapTrade](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zs4NbEaF0TcGJb-u_Kubera.png)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/www.kubera.com/>)
[![Zoya and SnapTrade](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zs4OBEaF0TcGJb-1_Zoya.png)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/zoya.finance/>)
[![Snowball and SnapTrade](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Z2LI45bqstJ98o0q_snowball-logo-hd.png)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/snowball-analytics.com/>)
[![Blossom and SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqgAKR5LeNNTxk8I_Blossom.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/www.blossomsocial.ca/>)
[![Tiicker and SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqgAJx5LeNNTxk8H_Tiicker.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/www.tiicker.com/>)
[![Delta and SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zs4S5UaF0TcGJcA3_Delta.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/delta.app/en>)
[![Simply Wall Street and SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zs4NM0aF0TcGJb-p_SWST.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/simplywall.st/>)
[![Sharesight and SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqgAJB5LeNNTxk8E_Sharesight.svg)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/www.sharesight.com/ca/>)
[![Kubera and SnapTrade](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zs4NbEaF0TcGJb-u_Kubera.png)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/www.kubera.com/>)
[![Zoya and SnapTrade](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zs4OBEaF0TcGJb-1_Zoya.png)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/zoya.finance/>)
[![Snowball and SnapTrade](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Z2LI45bqstJ98o0q_snowball-logo-hd.png)](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/snowball-analytics.com/>)
## Why SnapTrade
![Users icon](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zn7uLB5LeNNTwop1_users-icon.svg)
##### Onboard and keep users on your platform
Benefit from >95% connection success rates and long lived connections.
![Pie chart icon](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zn7uKx5LeNNTwop0_pie-chart-icon.svg)
##### Get the data you need, when you need it
Configure your app to access your users’ balances, holdings, orders, and transactions all based on your use-case and data syncing needs.
![Grid icon](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zn7uKh5LeNNTwopz_grid-icon.svg)
##### Add trading to your app
Leverage your users’ existing brokerage accounts to trade stocks, ETFs, crypto, and options from within your app.
[Let's chat](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/dashboard.snaptrade.com/contact-us>)
## Built for your use case
![Bar chart icon](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZoQSdB5LeNNTwtwx_bar-chart-icon.svg)
#### Portfolio analysis and tracking
Portfolio Scoring, Dividend Tracking, Portfolio Performance Monitoring, Investment Tax Reporting
Onboard users faster by eliminating the need for manual entry or CSV uploads while ensuring your users’ data stays up-to-date in your platform.
  * Accurate positions, orders, balances, and transactions data
  * Unified security tickers, currencies, and exchanges
  * High connection success and persistence rates


![Quote icon](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZoQK_x5LeNNTwtsV_button_large.svg)
One of the biggest friction points for us is the portfolio creation process and maintenance. By connecting their portfolios with SnapTrade it lets users import their portfolio in just a few clicks and stays up to date automatically. That is a big value proposition.
###### Mauro Ferrante
Group Product Manager, Simply Wall Street
![Share icon](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZoQSdh5LeNNTwtw0_share-icon.svg)
#### Holdings validation and portfolio sharing
Live Portfolio Sharing, External Monitoring, Holdings Perks
Engage users based on their current holdings and trading activity. Increase customer loyalty with trustworthy tools, eliminate manual verification forever, reduce the potential for fraud and improve compliance.
  * Unified holdings data
  * Historical transactions
  * Open and recently filled orders


![Quote icon](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZoQK_x5LeNNTwtsV_button_large.svg)
SnapTrade is the engine that drives our core engagement tools. The API gives our users the power to share their investments and learn from each other.
###### Max Nicholson
Founder, Blossom
![Grid icon](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZoQSdR5LeNNTwtwy_layout-alt-icon.svg)
#### Embedded trading
Placing Trades, Portfolio Rebalancing, Automated Trading
Build native trading experiences by leveraging your users' existing brokerage accounts and avoiding the high costs of becoming a broker.
  * Place stock, ETF, crypto, and options trades
  * Market and Limit orders
  * High connectivity rates


![Quote icon](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZoQK_x5LeNNTwtsV_button_large.svg)
SnapTrade’s developer-friendly API has been instrumental in creating a seamless halal investing experience at Zoya. Their support and flexibility have allowed us to build unique experiences that are tailored to the needs of our community.
###### Saad Malik
CEO and Co-Founder, Zoya
![Robinhood brokerage API integration with SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqKSCR5LeNNTxgNR_Robinhood.svg?auto=compress,format)
## Connectivity tothe world's topbrokerages
Access to over 125 million accounts in a single integration.
[See list](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/snaptrade.com/brokerage-integrations>)
![E*TRADE brokerage API integration with SnapTrade](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqftNx5LeNNTxk1F_etrade_logo.jpg?auto=format,compress)![Webull US brokerage API integration with SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqKSER5LeNNTxgNb_Webull.svg)![Trading 212 brokerage API integration with SnapTrade](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqfwGx5LeNNTxk2H_trading212-logo-square.png?auto=format,compress)![Wealthsimple brokerage API integration with SnapTrade](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqgOBh5LeNNTxk_0_WST.png?auto=format,compress)
![Questrade brokerage API integration with SnapTrade](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqKSCB5LeNNTxgNQ_Questrade.svg)
![Java](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zqfxmh5LeNNTxk2l_p-80-java.webp?auto=format%2Ccompress&rect=45%2C40%2C235%2C235&w=300&h=300)
![Java](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zqfxmh5LeNNTxk2l_p-80-java.webp?auto=format%2Ccompress&rect=45%2C40%2C235%2C235&w=300&h=300)
![Python](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZoWSaB5LeNNTwxR1_Python.svg?auto=compress,format)
![Typescript](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqfyZR5LeNNTxk3K_Typescript_logo_2020.svg.png?auto=format,compress)
## Integratein daysnot weeks
Our SDKs can help you get up and running quickly in the language of your choice.
[Try it](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/dashboard.snaptrade.com/signup>)
![Python](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZoWSaB5LeNNTwxR1_Python.svg?auto=compress,format)![Typescript](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/ZqfyZR5LeNNTxk3K_Typescript_logo_2020.svg.png?auto=format,compress)![Ruby](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zqf-8B5LeNNTxk7Z_ruby.svg?auto=compress,format)![C#](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zqf4nR5LeNNTxk40_C_Sharp_Logo_2023.svg.png?auto=format,compress)
## Integratein daysnot weeks
Our SDKs can help you get up and running quickly in the language of your choice.
[Try it](https://snaptrade.com/<https:/dashboard.snaptrade.com/signup>)
![PHP](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zqfy4R5LeNNTxk3R_php-icon-256x256-oq5bc0bt.png?auto=format,compress)
![Ruby](https://snaptrade-v3.cdn.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zqf-8B5LeNNTxk7Z_ruby.svg?auto=compress,format)
![C#](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zqf4nR5LeNNTxk40_C_Sharp_Logo_2023.svg.png?auto=format,compress)
![PHP](https://images.prismic.io/snaptrade-v3/Zqfy4R5LeNNTxk3R_php-icon-256x256-oq5bc0bt.png?auto=format,compress)

generated_description:
SnapTrade is a fintech company with a mission to serve as the Plaid for trading. Founded in 2017, and hailing from the Y Combinator Batch W22, SnapTrade operates out of Fredericton, Canada, with a focused team of 17. Their core offering is an API that allows fintech applications to connect to retail brokerage accounts, facilitating access to real-time account data, historical transactions, and trading capabilities without requiring users to transfer their accounts. This makes starting with investing significantly easier for users.

**What SnapTrade Offers:**
With SnapTrade, developers can integrate features that enhance user experience in investment apps by accessing balances, holdings, orders, and transactions. This is particularly useful for building new investing experiences that keep users engaged—all while maintaining their existing brokerage relationships. Their API supports trading in stocks, ETFs, crypto, and options right from within your application.

**Key Features:**
- **High Connection Success Rates:** SnapTrade boasts connectivity above 95%, which means more reliable experiences for users.
- **Real-Time Data Access:** Developers can get extensive data necessary for building robust financial applications.
- **Seamless Integration:** The SDKs available help get applications up and running quickly across popular programming languages.

**Why SnapTrade?**
This company differentiates itself by reducing the friction in portfolio management. They eliminate manual data entry, allowing users to onboard effortlessly. Additionally, SnapTrade supports portfolio validation and sharing, which helps platforms increase user engagement effectively.

**Trusted By:** 
SnapTrade has established itself with notable partnerships, enabling firms like Blossom, Tiicker, Delta, and others to enhance their investing tools seamlessly. Their API allows these organizations to provide richer experiences to their users without heavy lifting on the data management front.

**Closing Thoughts:**
In summary, SnapTrade is transforming how fintech applications interact with retail brokerage accounts. By simplifying integration and enhancing user experience through their API, they're not just about trading but improving overall investment management. If you're in the fintech space and want to incorporate trading capabilities into your platform, SnapTrade is worth checking out. You can learn more at [SnapTrade](https://snaptrade.com).
